description.value:
With a single whisper carried on the wind, you enchant your ammunition to make a foe more vulnerable to your attacks.

Make a bow Strike. On a hit, the target takes an additional [[/r 2d6[mental]]] damage. On a critical hit, the target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}. The mental damage increases to [[/r 3d6[mental]]] if your bow has a greater striking rune, or to [[/r 4d6[mental]]] if your bow has a major striking rune.
